page.title: 14Attitudes and Opinions.
page.content: We conducted a survey of local opinion on various issues. The questions and results from 100 households follow. 1. Should the mining spoil heaps remain?{Yes}39%{No}57%{Don't know}4% 2.Should the mining be revived? {Yes}22%{No }66%{Don't know}12% 3.Should there be a mining museum in our area?{Yes}54%{No}32%{Don't know}4% 4.Would you like a light railway opened?{Yes}56%{No}43%{Don't know}1% 5.Would you like play areas for local children?{Yes}87%{No}11%{Don't know}1% 6.Should tourism be encouraged? {Yes}49% {No}32%{Don't know}29% 7.Has enough been done to ensure safety?{Yes}11%{No}78%{Don't know}11% 8.Would you like to see more shops? {Yes}38%{No}52%{Don't know}10% 8.Should there be guided tours of the area?{Yes}54%{No}32%{Don't know}14%. { }
